alert.note: Alert for Salt Lake (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued April 18 at 8:29AM MDT until April 19 at 9:00AM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...The Flood Advisory continues for the following rivers in Utah... Emigration Creek Near Salt Lake City`s East Bench affecting Salt Lake County. .Snowmelt and rain today will continue to cause high flows. For Emigration Creek...including Salt Lake City`s East Bench...the creek will peak at action stage this evening. ...FLOOD ADVISORY FOR SNOWMELT REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TOMORROW MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by snowmelt and rain continues. * WHERE...Emigration Creek Near Salt Lake City. * WHEN...Until late tomorrow morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Current flow is at 79 cfs and falling. - Forecast...The creek will continue to fall today with a return to action stage this evening. Additional rainfall across Salt Lake County may increase flows above the current forecast peak and will be monitored. - Action flow is 110 cfs. - Flood flow is 130 cfs. &&
info.instruction: Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this evening at 1100 PM MDT.
